name: VOID (itch) (Kent Reese (whenbellstoll)) (Kent Reese (whenbellstoll))
description:
Welcome to the strange world of VOID. You find yourself engulfed in darkness, the only way to see is to move around.  Each corridor feels more confusing than the last, hints of sights and sounds may lead you to victory or astray. The only hope is to keep moving forward.

Original Music and Sound by Max Miller

Move around, find your path, get to the goal. What more do you need?

Key Features

  • 30+ platforming levels to test your skills
  • Reveal your path to the exit portal
  • Explore levels by shooting and jumping, showing the paths as you play. 
  • Experience the game's tight and responsive controls that don't make you feel cheated when you die
